title: Rune Refunds Ctd...
body: Runes are now 99% off. I have spent over 350,000 on runes (almost had all of them before this). Do I need to say more? Ritoplz {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Riot's got you covered on this one!

_"For runes you bought before the begging of the 2017 season (December 7th of last year), we'll give you 100 blue essence for each tier 3 rune, and 300 blue essence for each tier 3 quint."_ - [Source](https://youtu.be/Yq2i6RDmbNc?t=3m58s)

So you won't be getting 100% of the cost back, but you'll definitely be getting a lot. And when this happens, Riot will let you buy chromas and special skins in the store with the blue essence you get!
According to Riot it should come in November sometime
